author: Special Correspondent
text:
A retired employee of BHEL and two of his family members sustained injuries after being attacked by a youth at Ezhil Nagar in Tiruverumbur on Saturday.

Sources said S. Ezhilvendhan (30), an engineer working for a private firm in Chennai, entered his neighbour N. Radhakrishnan’s (61) house and attacked him, his wife Sujatha (50), and their daughter-in-law Nisha Devi (26) with ‘aruval’. Since they raised alarm, Ezhilvendhan fled away from the scene. However, he later attempted suicide by consuming poison.

While Radhakrishnan, who had retired from BHEL and his family had been admitted to the BHEL hospital at Tiruverumbur, Ezhilvendran was rushed to the Government Hospital in Tiruchi.
title: Three of family sustain injuries
